front.title: IEEE Apporved Draft Guide for DC Inclined Plane Tracking and Erosion Test for Outdoor Insulation Applications

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.keyword: inclined plane tracking and erosion test
front.abstract: This guide is intended for a suitable use of dc voltages with the inclined plane tracking and erosion test for the evaluation of the tracking and erosion resistance of high voltage outdoor insulating materials.
